aircraft.value: Chimera Multi - AC-5886-268 at Zone-3 Facility

defect_observed.value: Flight control cable fraying detected. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuel System component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation

preventive_action.value: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 01/06/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 03/06/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 04/06/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 06/06/2023 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 11/06/2023 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Flight control cable fraying detected. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Age-related degradation of elastomeric components
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuel System component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures
d) Attributable Code: NFF - No Failure Found
